identified-content.person: ROLL, DR. KAREN MAY (DR. KAREN MAY TRABULSI)

block.p: Dr. Karen May Roll and Dr. Edouard John Trabulsi are to be married today by the Rev. John Kroschel at the Ascension Lutheran Church in Snyder, N.Y.

The bride, 31, is a pediatrician with Kids Care Pediatrics in Egg Harbor Township, N.J. The bridegroom, 30, is a resident in urologic surgery at Thomas Jefferson University Hospital in Philadelphia. They received their medical degrees from the State University of New York at Buffalo, the bridegroom magna cum laude.
Dr. Karen May Roll and Dr. Edouard John Trabulsi are to be married today by the Rev. John Kroschel at the Ascension Lutheran Church in Snyder, N.Y.

The bride, 31, is a pediatrician with Kids Care Pediatrics in Egg Harbor Township, N.J. The bridegroom, 30, is a resident in urologic surgery at Thomas Jefferson University Hospital in Philadelphia. They received their medical degrees from the State University of New York at Buffalo, the bridegroom magna cum laude.

The bride graduated magna cum laude from St. Bonaventure University, and is a daughter of Marilyn and Lester Roll of East Aurora, N.Y. Her mother is an office assistant at Sports Focus Physical Therapy in Orchard Park, N.Y. Her father, who is retired, owned Roll's Sunoco Service in West Seneca, N.Y.

The bridegroom graduated cum laude from the University of Rochester, and is a son of Marianne Trabulsi and Victor Trabulsi, both of Brooklyn. His mother is a senior operations analyst in Brooklyn for Con Ed. His father retired as the owner of Express Printing, a former commercial printing business in Brooklyn.
